description:
This signal detects DNS network traffic logs that indicate an internal network
client reaching out to infrastructure on the Internet directly to answer name
queries. This activity could be a default or misconfiguration. This impacts
your organization's ability to provide enterprise monitoring and logging of DNS
and opens your network to a variety of abuses or malicious communications.
false_positives: You should apply a filter to this rule to exclude your enterprise nameservers that are expected to reach out to the Internet
name: DNS Activity to the Internet
